name: Delivery Hero Australia
tag_list: delivery-hero, menu-hero, takeaway, pizza-delivery, pizza, fast-food, takeout, home-delivery, food-delivery
overview:
Delivery Hero Australia is a part of international online food ordering network Delivery Hero Holding which operates in Germany, UK, Sweden, Finland, Poland, Austria, Switzerland, Russia, Mexico, South Korea, India and China.

Founded in September 2011, Delivery Hero Australia is on a mission to streamline the online food ordering process for customers and restaurants to ensure hassle free home delivery.

On the Delivery Hero Australia platform and mobile app, customers enter in their postcode to find delivery restaurants in their area. With a huge selection of cuisines to choose from and nationwide restaurant coverage Aussies can browse menus and pay for their meal using PayPal, credit card or cash on delivery. There is no extra surcharge for the customer, while restaurants pay a commission for the service.
